name: about brian and stewie
reviewBody: Just to comment about Stewie beating up Brian...I thought it was pretty funny actually. It works very well as sort of an homage to The Sopranos. There are numerous episodes of money collection and people "ducking" people to avoid paying. To be honest, I don't think I would have found it funny if I didn't enjoy, let alone know about, The Sopranos. Family Guy has gone a little down hill, but it's most certainly still in the upper echelon of TV shows out there. I've also found that seeing episodes on repeated viewings are actually funnier. I hope this show doesn't get canceled again. I also hope this comment helped out.
